title: Edit text how to switch a handwriting input method
answer:
Creates a new message, click on the input box, the following pop up soft keyboard, default to Bao input methods, touch, click on the top left of the keyboard ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601143344996001.gif)You can choose to use handwriting input method ( used for the first time need to download handwritten data file ). 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601143519433001.gif)
